Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at 90th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, 95th and Halsted due to, street blockage near 90th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, 95th and Halsted due to, street blockage near 90th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
